description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相，原名元崇，后为避唐玄宗“开元”年号讳改名姚崇。武则天、唐睿宗、唐玄宗三朝为相，因与宋璟并称“姚宋”，被誉为开创开元盛世的贤相之一。他提出的“姚崇十策”对开元初年的政治有重要影响，并成功领导了灭蝗工作。然而，他也因排挤同僚和其子辈行为不端而受到批评。
description.en: A chancellor of the Tang Dynasty, originally named Yuan Chong, he changed his name to Yao Chong to avoid the naming taboo of Emperor Xuanzong's 'Kaiyuan' era. Serving as chancellor under three sovereigns—Wu Zetian, Emperor Ruizong, and Emperor Xuanzong—he, along with Song Jing, is known as 'Yao-Song' and is celebrated as one of the virtuous chancellors who ushered in the Kaiyuan flourishing age. His 'Ten Proposals of Yao Chong' had a significant impact on early Kaiyuan politics, and he successfully led efforts to eradicate locust plagues. However, he also faced criticism for sidelining colleagues and for the misconduct of his sons.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，其“开元”年号期间，姚崇出任宰相。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang Dynasty, during whose 'Kaiyuan' era Yao Chong served as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 武周时期的统治者，曾赏识并擢升姚崇。
description.en: The ruler of the Wu Zhou dynasty who appreciated and promoted Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，在其任内姚崇曾再次担任宰相。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang Dynasty during whose reign Yao Chong was reappointed as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝皇帝，由张柬之等人协助复位。
description.en: An emperor of the Tang Dynasty who was restored to the throne with the help of Zhang Jianzhi and others.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝公主，曾与姚崇发生冲突，导致其被贬官。
description.en: A princess of the Tang Dynasty who had a conflict with Yao Chong, leading to his demotion.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相，与姚崇并称“姚宋”，由姚崇推荐接任宰相之位。
description.en: A chancellor of the Tang Dynasty, known together with Yao Chong as 'Yao-Song.' He was recommended by Yao Chong to succeed him as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，曾协助唐中宗复位。
description.en: A Tang Dynasty official who assisted in the restoration of Emperor Zhongzong.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇向唐玄宗提出的十项政治建议，内容包括废除严刑峻法、息兵休战、限制宦官和外戚干政等。
description.en: Ten policy proposals submitted by Yao Chong to Emperor Xuanzong, which included abolishing harsh laws, ceasing military campaigns, and restricting the political influence of eunuchs and imperial relatives by marriage.

description.zh-cn: 开元三年（715年）六月发生于山东地区的蝗虫灾害，在姚崇的坚持和领导下被成功扑灭。
description.en: A locust plague that occurred in the Shandong region in the sixth month of the third year of the Kaiyuan era (715). It was successfully eradicated under the insistence and leadership of Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇之父。
description.en: Father of Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇之母，姚懿的继室夫人，洺州刺史刘志逵之女。
description.en: Mother of Yao Chong, the second wife of Yao Yi, and daughter of Liu Zhikui, the prefect of Mingzhou.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇之兄。
description.en: Older brother of Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇之弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇之妻，陕州刺史王当之女。
description.en: Wife of Yao Chong, daughter of Wang Dang, the prefect of Shanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇之妻，姚彝、姚异的生母。
description.en: Wife of Yao Chong, and the birth mother of Yao Yi and Yao Yi.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇之妻，出自荥阳郑氏。
description.en: Wife of Yao Chong, from the Zheng clan of Xingyang.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇长子。
description.en: Eldest son of Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇次子。
description.en: Second son of Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇三子。
description.en: Third son of Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，因与姚崇不合而遭其排挤。
description.en: A Tang Dynasty official who was sidelined by Yao Chong due to their disagreements.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，因与姚崇不合而遭其排挤。
description.en: A Tang Dynasty official who was sidelined by Yao Chong due to their disagreements.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝官员，因与姚崇不合而遭其排挤。
description.en: A Tang Dynasty official who was sidelined by Yao Chong due to their disagreements.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人，曾点评姚崇为“大政治家、唯物论者”。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who once commented on Yao Chong as a 'great statesman and materialist'.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝宰相，曾为姚崇撰写神道碑。
description.en: A chancellor of the Tang Dynasty who wrote the spirit-way stele inscription for Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 位于河南省三门峡市，姚崇的出生地。
description.en: Located in Sanmenxia City, Henan Province, it is the birthplace of Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 武周时期，姚崇受武则天赏识，升为同中书门下三品，成为宰相。
description.en: During the Wu Zhou period, Yao Chong was appreciated by Wu Zetian and promoted to Tong Zhongshu Menxia Sanpin, becoming a chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 张柬之协助唐中宗复位。
description.en: Zhang Jianzhi assisted Emperor Zhongzong in regaining the throne.

description.zh-cn: 唐睿宗时期，姚崇再次被任命为宰相。
description.en: During the reign of Emperor Ruizong, Yao Chong was reappointed as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇因与太平公主发生冲突，被贬至申州任刺史。
description.en: Due to a conflict with Princess Taiping, Yao Chong was demoted to the position of prefect in Shenzhou.

position.en: Minister of War and Tong Pingzhangshi

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗即位之初，任命姚崇为兵部尚书、同平章事（宰相）。
description.en: At the beginning of his reign, Emperor Xuanzong appointed Yao Chong as Minister of War and Tong Pingzhangshi (chancellor).

description.zh-cn: 姚崇在再度任相后向唐玄宗提出十项政治建议，即“姚崇十策”。
description.en: After being reappointed as chancellor, Yao Chong proposed ten political suggestions to Emperor Xuanzong, known as the 'Ten Proposals of Yao Chong'.

description.zh-cn: 唐玄宗赞赏并接纳了姚崇提出的十项建议。
description.en: Emperor Xuanzong appreciated and accepted the ten proposals put forward by Yao Chong.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇坚持对蝗虫进行捕杀，成功杜绝了山东的蝗灾。
description.en: Yao Chong insisted on exterminating the locusts and successfully put an end to the locust plague in Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 开元四年（716年），姚崇请求避位，并推荐宋璟接任宰相。
description.en: In the fourth year of Kaiyuan (716), Yao Chong requested to step down and recommended Song Jing to succeed him as chancellor.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇与宋璟并称为开创开元盛世的两位贤相，世人合称“姚宋”。
description.en: Yao Chong and Song Jing are known together as the two virtuous chancellors who initiated the Kaiyuan flourishing age, and are collectively referred to as 'Yao-Song'.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇深忌惮魏知古，并暗中加以谗毁，使其被罢免宰相职务。
description.en: Yao Chong was deeply wary of Wei Zhigu and secretly slandered him, leading to his dismissal from the chancellorship.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇厌恶钟绍京的为人，上奏称其发言怨望，导致钟绍京被贬为绵州刺史。
description.en: Yao Chong disliked Zhong Shaojing's character and reported to the emperor that his words were resentful, which led to Zhong Shaojing's demotion to Prefect of Mianzhou.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇嫉忌刘幽求，上奏称其心怀不满且有怨言，导致刘幽求被贬为睦州刺史。
description.en: Yao Chong was jealous of Liu Youqiu and reported to the emperor that he was discontented and resentful, leading to Liu Youqiu's demotion to Prefect of Muzhou.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在点评《新唐书·姚崇传》时，称姚崇为“大政治家、唯物论者”。
description.en: When commenting on the 'New Book of Tang: Biography of Yao Chong', Mao Zedong called Yao Chong a 'great statesman and materialist'.

description.zh-cn: 张说为姚崇撰写了神道碑文，记述并评价其生平。
description.en: Zhang Yue wrote the spirit-way stele inscription for Yao Chong, recording and evaluating his life.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇是姚懿的儿子。
description.en: Yao Chong is the son of Yao Yi.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇是刘氏的儿子。
description.en: Yao Chong is the son of Lady Liu.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇是姚元景的弟弟。
description.en: Yao Chong is the younger brother of Yao Yuanjing.

description.zh-cn: 姚崇是姚元素的哥哥。
description.en: Yao Chong is the older brother of Yao Yuansu.
